critique: The document is a delegation of authority. The primary emotion the President wants to elicit is probably a sense of efficiency and trust in the Director of the Office of Management and Budget. There isn't much emotional content here, so most scores will be low. Initial scores: joy: 2, sadness: 1, anger: 1, fear: 1, disgust: 1, surprise: 2. Revised scores: joy: 2, sadness: 1, anger: 1, fear: 1, disgust: 1, surprise: 1.
